mapper.select: SELECT A.boardNo, A.preCategory1, A.title, A.content, A.preProductNo, A.preImageNo, A.memberId, A.regdate, A.active, A.deleted, B.price, C.fileName FROM PRODUCTBOARD A INNER JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.preProductNo = B.productNo INNER JOIN IMAGE C ON A.preImageNo = C.imageNo WHERE A.preCategory1=#{preCategory1} AND A.active='T' AND A.deleted='F'

SELECT A.boardNo, A.preCategory1, A.title, A.content, A.preProductNo, A.preImageNo, A.memberId, A.regdate, A.active, A.deleted, B.price, C.fileName FROM PRODUCTBOARD A INNER JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.preProductNo = B.productNo INNER JOIN IMAGE C ON A.preImageNo = C.imageNo WHERE A.title LIKE #{%keyWord%} AND A.active='T' AND A.deleted='F'

SELECT A.boardNo, A.preCategory1, A.title, A.content, A.preProductNo, A.preImageNo, A.memberId, A.regdate, A.active, A.deleted, B.price, C.fileName FROM PRODUCTBOARD A INNER JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.preProductNo = B.productNo INNER JOIN IMAGE C ON A.preImageNo = C.imageNo WHERE A.active='T' AND A.deleted='F'

SELECT A.productNo, A.memberId, A.category1, A.category2, A.name, A.price, A.qty, A.regdate, A.active, A.deleted FROM PRODUCT A INNER JOIN LINKEDPRODUCT B ON A.productNo = B.productNo WHERE B.boardNo = #{boardNo}
SELECT productNo, memberId, category1, category2, name, price, qty, regdate, active, deleted FROM PRODUCT WHERE productNo=#{productNo} and active='T' and deleted='F'
SELECT productNo, memberId, category1, category2, name, price, qty, regdate, active, deleted FROM PRODUCT WHERE memberId=#{memberId} and active='T' and deleted='F'
SELECT imageNo, productNo, oriName, fileName FROM IMAGE WHERE productNo=#{productNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCTBOARD (preCategory1, title, content, preProductNo, preImageNo, memberId) VALUES (#{preCategory1}, #{title}, #{content}, #{preProductNo}, #{preImageNo}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT A.boardNo, A.preCategory1, A.title, A.content, A.preProductNo, A.preImageNo, A.memberId, A.regdate, A.active, A.deleted, B.price, C.fileName FROM PRODUCTBOARD A INNER JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.preProductNo = B.productNo INNER JOIN IMAGE C ON A.preImageNo = C.imageNo WHERE A.boardNo=#{boardNo} AND A.active='T' AND A.deleted='F'

SELECT count(A.productNo) count, A.productNo FROM CART A INNER JOIN ORDERLIST B ON A.cartNo = B.cartNo INNER JOIN PRODUCT C ON A.productNo = C.productNo WHERE A.ordered='T' GROUP BY A.productNo ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 2
SELECT boardNo FROM LINKEDPRODUCT WHERE productNo=#{productNo} ORDER BY boardNo DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT C.category1 FROM CART A INNER JOIN ORDERLIST B ON A.cartNo = B.cartNo INNER JOIN PRODUCT C ON A.productNo = C.productNo WHERE A.ordered='T' GROUP BY A.productNo ORDER BY count(A.productNo) DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT A.boardNo, A.preCategory1, A.title, A.content, A.preProductNo, A.preImageNo, A.memberId, A.regdate, A.active, A.deleted, B.price, C.fileName FROM PRODUCTBOARD A INNER JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.preProductNo = B.productNo INNER JOIN IMAGE C ON A.preImageNo = C.imageNo WHERE A.active='T' AND A.deleted='F' ORDER BY A.boardNo DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT A.boardNo, A.preCategory1, A.title, A.content, A.preProductNo, A.preImageNo, A.memberId, A.regdate, A.active, A.deleted, B.price, C.fileName FROM PRODUCTBOARD A INNER JOIN PRODUCT B ON A.preProductNo = B.productNo INNER JOIN IMAGE C ON A.preImageNo = C.imageNo WHERE A.preCategory1=#{preCategory1} AND A.active='T' AND A.deleted='F' ORDER BY A.boardNo DESC LIMIT 4
